Class AbapShallowParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.shallowparser.framework.ShallowParserBase<AbapShallowParser.EAbapParserStates>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShallowParser

    public class AbapShallowParser
extends ShallowParserBase<AbapShallowParser.EAbapParserStates>
    Shallow parser for ABAP. The following links are useful for writing the parser:
    • ABAP Keyword Documentation
    • ABAP Statements Overview

    • Method Detail

      • isFilteredToken

        protected boolean isFilteredToken(IToken token,
                                  IToken previousToken)
        Template method that can be used to ignore/filter certain tokens. Default implementation ignores comments.
        Overrides:
        isFilteredToken in class ShallowParserBase<AbapShallowParser.EAbapParserStates>
        previousToken - the last non-filtered token (can be used for context sensitive filtering). This may be null is no previous token exists.
